name: places/ChIJU58wYqFZwokRTu29xp3ajvc
formattedAddress: 450 W 31st St 7th floor, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 450 W 31st St 7th floor, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text: We recently organised an event in NYC and found Location05 in Hudsons Yards. Where do I even begin - it is the best venue I have ever used for an event, in 11 years of event planning. Alex & her team could not do enough to help us at all stages of the planning process and then also on the event day. The space is extremely spacious, light (with lots of natural light flooding in and white walls & floors), and versatile. The venue has lots of furniture and props to hire, which really helped us as we didn't need to hire so much in. They recommended caterers, AV providers and many other suppliers who all did a fantastic job and were competitively priced. The flexibility to paint and decal directly on walls was fantastic - it really helped create such a wonderful backdrop to our event - and incredibly sustainable instead of printing onto sets. We couldn't recommend Location05, Alex and all of her team enough for events! We cannot wait to be back in NYC to host more events here!

originalText.text: I organised the Slashie Summit at Location05 and I found the place very spacious and easily accessible. It’s a good location to have events and meet-ups!

text.text: I organised the Slashie Summit at Location05 and I found the place very spacious and easily accessible. It’s a good location to have events and meet-ups!

originalText.text: Beautiful venue for all kinds of events! My friend got married in this stunning venue and they made her vision come to life!

text.text: Beautiful venue for all kinds of events! My friend got married in this stunning venue and they made her vision come to life!

originalText.text:
Located right by Hudson Yards is a hidden gem - this venue is perfect for hosting intimate gatherings to grand affairs, with it's adjustable air walls, high ceilings, and breathtaking views of the neighborhood. This blank canvas space really allows for you to execute your creative vision. As their preferred production company - we're excited to host more events with the Location05 team. Many thanks to Alex & John for their welcoming & accommodating company from the site tour to day-of production!

- MR Hospitality
